body_html: right, is anyone able to advise where do those changes need to go in the bazel part of the instructions on SstackOverflow? Any help is greatly appreciated. While this doesn't solve the bigger problems with getting tensorflow to work on SATV, it does offer me (and others) the chance to get it going in the current format
